innhold.avsnitt: You must take the first six weeks of the parental benefit immediately following the birth. These weeks cannot be combined with work or holidays. The final nine weeks can be taken immediately following this or be saved for later.
If you adopt, you can take your share at any time after care of the child is assumed.
If you are so sick that you are completely dependent on assistance for taking care of the child, the co-mother can apply to take over your maternal quota.
